title: Get the details of a TTO Creator Marketplace account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TTO Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: tto_tcm_account_id
fields.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account.

fields.name: account_name
fields.description: The name of the TTO Creator Marketplace account.

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: The time zone code of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. Example: America/Los_Angeles . To find out the time zone that a time zone code corresponds to, see Time zone .

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country or region code of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. Example: US . To find out the country or region that a country or region code corresponds to, see Location code .

fields.name: business_verification_status
fields.description: The business verification status of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. Enum values: NOT_SUBMITTED : The account has not been submitted for business verification review. UNDER_REVIEW : The account is under business verification review. NOT_PASSED : The account has failed the business verification review. PASSED : The account has passed the business verification review. EXPIRED : The business verification for the account has expired. Learn more about Business Verification on TikTok One .
